name: Briqpay Fortnox Product Sync
author: briqpay,mnording10

sections.description:
Want to ensure that your WooCommerce catalogue and your Fortnox registry is synced to 100% ? This plugin is the solution!

By offering an easy-to-use dashboard you can view all you Woo products and their respective item in Fortnox.

Is something missing? Simply add it with the click of a button
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the contents to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Add the constant to your functions.php

define(“FORTNOX_ACCESS_TOKEN”, “”);
sections.faq:
What does this plugin do?

It validates that the product catalogue that you have in WooCommerce matches the articles you have setup in Fortnox. This is to ensure no article clashes when using the briqpay B2B Checkout solution.

How do i get my access token?

Contact your briqpay representative

short_description: Sync your woocommerce products to fortnox, ensure that data is consistent between the 2 systems
